```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(kableExtra)
library(htmltools)
```


```{r, include=FALSE}
tabelas <- function(xi)
{
  ll <- list()
  for(i in 1:3)
  {
    yi <- xi + rpois(10, 2)
    ll[[i]] <- kable(yi, col.names = "")
  }
  names(ll) <- NULL
  return(ll)
}
```

```{r, results='asis'}  
for(j in 1:3)
{
  cat("### Section", j, "\n")
  xi  <- rgeom(10, 0.4/j)
  aux <- tabelas(xi)
  print(aux[[1]])
  cat("\n")
}
```
